1:
--------------------
Text: Ring-tailed cat:  It is also known as the ringtail cat, ring-tailed cat, miner's cat or bassarisk, and is also sometimes called a "civet cat" (after similar, though unrelated, cat-like omnivores of Asia and Africa).
Triplets:<Ring-tailed cat
2:
--------------------
Text: Ring-tailed cat:  The ringtail is sometimes called a cacomistle, though this term seems to be more often used to refer to "Bassariscus sumichrasti".
Triplets:<Ring-tailed cat
